text: so those pictures were taken with DJ
eyes Mavic pro this is it the new drone
that DJI has come out with so let me
just show you why this drone is so
special this is what the drum looks like
when it's ready to fly the best part
about it is how compact it really is the
propellers just fold up and each leg
folds this is what the size looks like
when it's completely compact it is so
manageable and easy to carry and score I
flew home over the weekend with the
Mavic Pro and just tuck this in my
carry-on bag so this is our old phantom
2 from DJI that we've used for a few
years this is an older model so you can
just see the difference in size here
obviously this one the Phantom does not
fold up so let's take a look at some of
the footage
I took the drone down to Tuscaloosa
Alabama my home town over the weekend
was able to get some beautiful shots I
barely had to do any work at all the
Mavic did the work for me this is the
remote controller for the medic throat
as you can see my phone is just mounted
onto it you use your phone to connect to
the DJI app and that's how you're able
to see what your camera sees to see all
sorts of telemetry to see readings that
give you your altitude your distance
where the drone is flying in relation to
where you are just fantastic flying
experience that made me feel totally
safe and in control the fact that the
camera has become so advanced takes such
beautiful images the fact that it's so
compact so portable so easy to travel
with just makes this a must-have for
photographers and videographers that
want to incorporate aerial photography
into their work
